gloss: an unelaborated elementary awareness of stimulation
causing intense interest, curiosity, or emotion
an unelaborated elementary awareness of stimulation

(psychoanalysis) an unconscious process whereby two ideas or images combine into a single symbol; especially in dreams / an unelaborated elementary awareness of stimulation / the cognitive processes whereby past experience is remembered

a sensation that normally occurs in one sense modality occurs when another modality is stimulated / an unelaborated elementary awareness of stimulation / the cognitive processes whereby past experience is remembered
a distinctive emotional aura experienced instinctively / emotions experienced when in a state of well-being / the feeling caused by agreeable stimuli; one pole of a continuum of states of feeling
